measurements.description: Four flowers and one bud on five inflorescences, longest inflorescence 9.3cm; hooded dorsal sepal yellow, marked maroon, cauda green-yellow; lateral sepals rolled proximal three-quarters, yellow overlaid burgundy, caudae green-yellow; small petals yellow, marked maroon; lip maroon; anther cap bright yellow; substance firm; texture waxy.

corrections.reason: Updated to reflect actual source page URL structure (YYMMDD/awardNum.html)
